title: Resident Profile switch thumb color update (ON white, OFF green)

requirements.summary: Adjust the “Show Physician Signature Fields” switch so only its thumb changes to white when ON and green when OFF, without modifying label styling or other switches, and without editing shadcn/ui files.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Resident Profile page, the “Show Physician Signature Fields” switch thumb is green when unchecked/off.
On the Resident Profile page, the “Show Physician Signature Fields” switch thumb is white when checked/on.
The switch track/background behavior is not changed beyond what is necessary to set the thumb color.
The “Show Physician Signature Fields” label text color and styling do not change between on/off states.
Implementation does not require editing any files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose via className and/or global CSS selectors instead).

file_operations.description: Update the Switch usage for id="physician-signature" to style only the internal thumb via Switch className (e.g., using Tailwind arbitrary selectors targeting the immediate child/thumb element with state-based variants) so the thumb is green when unchecked and white when checked, while keeping the existing label classes unchanged and avoiding any changes that would affect other Switch instances.
